name: Namco Museum 50th Anniversary
summary:
Namco Museum 50th Anniversary on Game Boy Advance, includes 14 Classic Arcade Hits;
- Pac-Man
- Ms. Pac-Man
- Galaga
- Galaxian
- Rally-X
- Pole Position
- Pole Position 2
- Xevious
- Dragon Spirit
- Bosconian
- Rolling Thunder
- Mappy
- Spy Kid
- Dig Dug
